name: 陳晏笙
objective:
1.	Sinusoidal Steady-State Power Calculations 
2.	Balance Three-Phase Circuits
3.	Two-Port Network Analysis
4.	Laplace Transform and Its Application in Circuit Analysis 
5.	Fourier Series and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
schedule:
第一週	Introduction
第二週	Sinusoidal Steady-State Power Calculations
第三週	Sinusoidal Steady-State Power Calculations
第四週	Balance Three-Phase Circuits
第五週	Balance Three-Phase Circuits
第六週	Two-Port Network Analysis
第七週	Two-Port Network Analysis
第八週	Two-Port Network Analysis
第九週	期中考
第十週	Laplace Transform and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
第十一週	Laplace Transform and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
第十二週	Laplace Transform and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
第十三週	Laplace Transform and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
第十四週	Fourier Series and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
第十五週	Fourier Series and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
第十六週	Fourier Series and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
第十七週	Fourier Series and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
第十八週	期末考
scorePolicy:
隨堂測驗  20%
期中考  40%
期末考  40%
materials:

2.	陳在泩（編譯自上述課本），電路學下，東華書局
